name: Cargo Pickup Offroad 3D
description:
Cargo Pickup Offroad is a 3D game to test your driving skills with time management. Drive in your cargo car and deliver orders to your destination as a responsible cargo transporter. It requires professional trucker skills to handle this lorry driving. Test your mountain driving skills with offroad cargo pickup truck and explore natural hill tracks. It takes a real transporter to drive on steep paths and curvy roads with luxury goods.
Features
- Smooth controls
- Extraordinary graphics
- Excellent pickup truck modals
- Realistic arena
